meanings.definition: Not participating in a vote or election.
meanings.sent1: The nonvoting members of the club do not have a say in the decisions.
meanings.sent2: She is a nonvoting member of the committee, so she cannot cast a vote.
meanings.sent3: The nonvoting penguin in the group always ends up going along with the majority's choice.
meanings.sent4: The nonvoting trees in the forest seemed to sway in agreement with the wind.
meanings.sent5: The nonvoting students sat quietly while the others debated the topic.

meanings.definition: A person who does not vote in an election.
meanings.sent1: The nonvoting at the meeting was noticeable as many chose not to participate.
meanings.sent2: As a nonvoting, he did not feel the need to voice his opinion on the matter.
meanings.sent3: The nonvoting in the class election missed out on the chance to influence the outcome.
meanings.sent4: She felt like a nonvoting in the crowd of eager voters.
meanings.sent5: The nonvoting was content observing the election process without taking part.
